channel.title: Broken foot on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Broken foot on Martin's Blog

item.title: Broken foot
item.description: I have done a few things in my life and and a lot of them involving my feet: I’ve hiked for hundreds of miles round Pembrokeshire, jumped out of an airplane 146 times, hiked up Kilimanjaro and the worse injury I had was a sore heel. But hell noooo, I have a lovely afternoon stroll on a gravel road and I go and break a foot. That’s it, my first fractured bone in my life at 48.
